entry.title: even filled with anxiety, I don't back down
entry.summary:
Author: strawberrylemontart

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,055Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 52

Summary: "You think I'm ashamed of you?" There's confusion in Hal's voice, and a roughness to it too."I-," Bruce starts and finds himself stopping, coughing before trying again, "I can't help but worry if you don't want to be seen with me. I thought that maybe it's because we're two men but then I started thinking maybe it's just about it being me you're with."-----Bruce and Hal's relationship is still fairly new. They're still familiarizing themselves with each other and enjoying all their new intimate moments. Something's been bothering Bruce though, he feels like Hal has been hiding him, ashamed to be seen with him. Eventually, they're forced to face their misunderstandings.

entry.title: A Bat-Vacay
entry.summary:
Author: Alex_Blanc

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,177Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 35

Summary: The Wayne family rarely, if ever, went on vacation. If Bruce agreed to leave Gotham for more than twelve hours, it was usually because the Justice League had collectively dragged him somewhere “for his own good.” This time, both the Batfamily and the League had conspired against him. It had been Dick’s idea, loudly seconded by Barry, that they all deserved a break on neutral ground—a sunny coastal resort tucked away on a private island.

entry.title: A Needle in a Doll
entry.summary:
Author: dandywarholic

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 59,911Chapters: 16/16Kudos: 757

Summary: Hal Jordan, on a business trip to Gotham, is pretty sure he met the love of his life. He's gorgeous, he's smart, he's charming. When he thinks he finally has happiness in his grasp, the ring chooses him and sends him to Oa.When Hal gets back, Bruce isn't the same person who he met six months prior. He's moved on, he's hurt, and Hal can't recover it without exposing his identity.Who would guess that in years to come, they'd become coworkers who hate each others guts?
